rows.label: qst700404_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo Mo-mo?! Hero-friends took
nasty Gogols out of picture?

rows.label: qst700404_msg0002
rows.name:
That incredible! Now Morumo have
to upgrade hero-friends status to
hero-hero-friends!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0003
rows.name:
But this no time to be celebrating.
Popolo! You hear news?

rows.label: qst700404_msg0004
rows.name:
Indeed! Popolo set out on double
and tell everypon that-

rows.label: qst700404_msg0005
rows.name: Hold thought of Popolo!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0006
rows.name:
Mo Mo-mo? Boss sharing
news himself?!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0007
rows.name:
...So you see, thanks to hero-hero-
friends, is completely safe to use
oasis again.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0008
rows.name: All can rest safe and easy again!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0009
rows.name:
Thank you so much. It's been
such an inconvenience, not being
able to peddle our wares.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0010
rows.name:
This enormous weight off our
feathers! Will never forget kindness
of hero-hero-friends!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0011
rows.name: Aw, it was nothing really...

rows.label: qst700404_msg0012
rows.name:
That's our boss. Always finds
the best people for the job.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0013
rows.name:
Never a truer word was spoken.
Business is always thriving with
the chairman in charge.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0014
rows.name:
You really must drop by at the store
some time. We've saved some of the
sweetest, fluffiest potatoes just for you!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0015
rows.name:
Oh, please do! We've been dying to
show you some of our latest products!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0016
rows.name:
Mo! Not fair! Not leaving me out!
Me want to see as well!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0017
rows.name: Ah, screw it - count me in too!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0018
rows.name:
Mo...MEH...?!
P-please form orderly line!!!

rows.label: qst700404_msg0019
rows.name: Wow... This place is full to bursting.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0020
rows.name:
So it's not just business that's
his strong suit. He's something
of a local celebrity as well.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0021
rows.name:
It warms my heart to see such
delight on everyone's faces.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0022
rows.name: Cute.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0023
rows.name:
You must feel a real kinship with
the people, Hugo. It shows.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0024
rows.name: It...it does?

rows.label: qst700404_msg0025
rows.name: Hrm...

rows.label: qst700404_msg0026
rows.name: What's on your mind Minochi?

rows.label: qst700404_msg0027
rows.name:
Ah, well... Let's just say I don't
trust posers.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0028
rows.name:
Harsh words, coming from the
Deacon's Blade.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0029
rows.name:
You can say what you like, but
nobody's a perfect picture of virtue.
That goes for people and Blades.

rows.label: qst700404_msg0030
rows.name: Life's never that straightforward...
